ðŸš€ Access Help: How to Make a New Google Account

If a movie won't load, you may need to sign in. To create a fresh account for watching:

  1. Go to [accounts.google.com/signup](https://accounts.google.com/signup).
  2. Enter your name and choose a new username/email.
  3. Create a strong password and add your birthday.
  4. Once signed in, refresh this page to watch your movies!
